description: Some thick insulation, keeps you from being nothing. This one is made from FURRY BUGS.

name: Fur filler
description: Some thick fur insulation, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Faux-Fur filler
description: Some thick fur insulation, now cruelty-free! excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Wool filler
description: Some thick wool insulation, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering. It feels like cuddling a cloud.

name: Cotton filler
description: Some bits of thick cotton for use as insulation, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering. It feels like cuddling a cloud.

name: Void-Colored insulation
description: A large sheet of some sort of fur you've never seen before. It shifts from black & purple, depending where you look at it from, & is very warm. It feels like it's hugging you.

name: Cotton filler
description: Essentially a bunch of plastic junk thrown into a packet. Good for keeping rain & cold out, but it's terribly encumbering.
A pair of custom pockets, that allow you to put armor into the shins of your pants. One for the left, one for the right.

pocket_data.//: Armor pocket, should be able to hold the ABSOLUTE max that the inserts can hold. No less, no more. Huge values are temporary, for now

description: Some thick fur insulation, keeps you from being cold. This one is made from FURRY BUGS.

name: Fur Filler
description: Some thick fur insulation made from fur. Excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Faux-Fur Filler
description: Some thick faux-fur insulation, now cruelty-free! excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering.

name: Wool Filler
description: Some thick wool insulation, excellent at keeping you from the cold, but pretty encumbering. It feels like walking through a cloud.
